content: University of Kansas School of Medicine Skip to main content. kumc.edu School of Health Professions School of Medicine School of Nursing University of Kansas The University of Kansas Health System The University of Kansas Cancer Center Search within this section Search all sites Home Academics Research Patient Care Campuses Outreach About Our Campuses Make a Gift Info for School of Health Professions School of Medicine School of Nursing Current Students Blackboard Webmail myKUMC Prospective Students Prospective Employees Alumni Faculty & Staff Residents & Fellows Patients Donors Researchers Visitors KU School of Medicine is a hub for outstanding education programs and world-class research. More than 80% of our first-year students hail from Kansas. Across three campuses, our students learn from mentors at the top of their game. Our students prepare for careers at the forefront of medicine and science. KU powers discoveries that serve local and global health needs. Pause Play Our Campuses Three unique locations, same excellent education Receive top-tier clinical training in a thriving urban environment. Kansas City campus Kansas City Prepare to deliver expert medical care in rural communities. Salina campus Salina Strengthen your medical education in the largest city in Kansas. Wichita campus Wichita Ranked Tier 1 for Medical School-Primary Care (U.S. News & World Report) $72 million NIH research funding 24 degree options available Doctor's Note “I chose KU because of my Kansas ties and because of their mission to serve rural Kansas. Additionally, it's one of the best medical schools in the Midwest and I knew that I would have excellent education and work with top-of-the-line physicians. ” — Kourtney Fourth-year student Featured News from KU School of Medicine KU School of Medicine resident wins state fiddle championship Wichita’s Edith Sigler says her lifelong pursuit of music has ingrained skills she’s used in medical school and as a resident doctor.
